Body:
"""      starting dirs & files:
            src_dir\\mysubdir oo.csv
            dst_dir\\mysubdir oo.csv
                  should become:
            dst_dir\\mysubdir oo.csv
            dst_dir\\mysubdir oo.1.csv
        """
create_test_file(self.dest_subdir, 'foo.csv', '')
self.cmd = get_cmd(self.source_dir, self.dest_dir, match_on='name_only',
    on_match='keep_both')
runner = envoy.run(self.cmd)
print('dest_dir:')
print(os.listdir(self.dest_dir))
print('')
print('dest_subdir:')
print(os.listdir(self.dest_subdir))
self.assert_results(runner, source_files=None, dest_files=['foo.csv',
    'foo.1.csv'])
